items.title: Basic Arithmetic Operations
items.description: Implement a calculator that can perform addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.
acceptance_criteria: User can input two numbers and select an operation (add, subtract, multiply, divide).
Application displays the correct result for the selected operation.
Division by zero displays an error message without crashing.
non_functional: Response time for calculation should be less than 0.5 seconds.
Application should work on both desktop and mobile devices.

notes: User request was vague; assumed requirement is for a basic calculator app with core arithmetic functions.
